dialogueLines.line: How can a paper-thin, 2D troglodyte beat someone like me?!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Well, it looks like the only thing paper-thin here is your singing talent.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Now then, I think it's about time you send me back home, no?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Fine, fine. I've grown bored of you all anyways.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I'll send all of you home.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma
